## Source: ossf-package-analysis (54812f0ff9d7ef156bc34dda479dabee551c6c88d9044ec701b39ba3e32b782d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'batchran' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
